overview: stalwart: 24 tools; jmap_delete_emails -> Delete emails., jmap_get_email -> Get full email content by ID., jmap_list_mailboxes -> List mailboxes (folders) for account., jmap_move_emails -> Move emails to folder., jmap_search_emails -> Search emails with filters., jmap_send_email -> Send email from account., jmap_set_keywords -> Set email flags (read, flagged, etc)., stalwart_create_account -> Create email account with password., stalwart_delete_account -> Delete account permanently., stalwart_generate_dkim -> Generate new DKIM signing key for domain., stalwart_get_account -> Get account details by name., stalwart_get_dns_records -> Get required DNS records for domain., stalwart_get_metrics -> Get server performance metrics., stalwart_get_reports -> Get DMARC, TLS, or ARF reports., stalwart_get_settings -> Get server configuration settings., stalwart_list_accounts -> List accounts (users, groups, domains)., stalwart_list_queue -> List messages in delivery queue., stalwart_queue_delete -> Delete message from queue permanently., stalwart_queue_retry -> Force immediate retry of queued message., stalwart_queue_start -> Start/resume mail queue processing., stalwart_queue_status -> Get mail queue processing status., stalwart_queue_stop -> Stop/pause mail queue processing., stalwart_reload_config -> Reload server configuration without restart., stalwart_update_account -> Update account settings.
